ruleset.name: Android Rules
ruleset.description: These rules deal with the Android SDK, mostly related to best practices. To get better results, make sure that the auxclasspath is defined for type resolution to work.

rule.name: CallSuperFirst
rule.message: super must be called at the start of the method
rule.description: Super must be called at the start of the method

property.name: xpath

rule.name: CallSuperLast
rule.message: super must be called at the end of the method
rule.description: Super must be called at the end of the method

property.name: xpath

rule.name: ProtectLogD
rule.message: Log.d must be protected by checking Config.LOGD
rule.description: Log.d must be protected by checking Config.LOGD

rule.name: ProtectLogV
rule.message: Log.v must be protected by checking Config.LOGV
rule.description: Log.v must be protected by checking Config.LOGV
